library(data.table)

## Focal strategy data

Load generation strategy data.

```{r}
files <- list.files(
  "data/results/morph_data",
  pattern = "default",
  full.names = TRUE
)

data_all <- lapply(files, fread)
data_all <- rbindlist(data_all)

df_strat <- data_all[(dispersal == 2) & (infect_percent == F) &
                       (scenario_tag == "default")]
df_strat <- df_strat[(cost == 0.25) & (regen == 50)]

# popsize
popsize <- 500
df_strat[, prop := N / popsize]

# get time since pathogen
sgen <- 500
genmax <- 1000
df_strat[, gen_abs := gen - sgen]

# save for plotting and upload
fwrite(
  df_strat,
  file = "data/results/data_default_strategy_evo.csv"
)
```

```{r}
# load saved data
df_strat <- fread("data/results/data_default_strategy_evo.csv")
```

## Plot evolutionary change in default scenario

```{r}
fig_evo_social_strategy =
ggplot() +
  geom_line(
    data = df_strat[social_strat != "non-handler tracking", ],
    aes(
      gen_abs, prop, col = social_strat,
      group = interaction(social_strat, repl)
    ),
    size = 0.2, alpha = 0.6
  ) +
  stat_summary(
    data = df_strat[social_strat != "non-handler tracking" & gen %% 10 == 0, ],
    aes(
      gen_abs, prop,
      colour = social_strat
    ),
    size = 0.2,
    shape = 16
  ) +
  geom_vline(
    xintercept = c(0, 25, 250),
    lty = 2,
    size = 0.3,
    col = c("red", "grey", "grey")
  ) +
  scale_colour_discrete_sequential(
    palette = "Viridis",
    l2 = 80,
    rev = FALSE,
    name = NULL,
    limits = c("agent avoiding", "agent tracking", "handler tracking"),
    labels = stringr::str_to_sentence,
    na.value = "lightgrey"
  ) +
  scale_fill_discrete_sequential(
    palette = "Viridis",
    rev = FALSE,
    name = NULL,
    limits = c("agent avoiding", "agent tracking", "handler tracking"),
    labels = stringr::str_to_sentence,
    na.value = "lightgrey"
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    # trans = ggallin::pseudolog10_trans,
    breaks = c(-25, 0, 25, 100, 200),
    labels = scales::comma_format(
      accuracy = 1
    ),
    name = "Gens. after pathogen intro.",
    sec.axis = sec_axis(
      trans = function(x) x + sgen,
      breaks = c(sgen, sgen + 100, sgen + 200),
      labels = scales::comma_format(
        accuracy = 1
      ),
      name = "Generations"
    )
  )+
  scale_y_continuous(
    breaks = c(0, 0.5, 1),
    labels = scales::percent,
    name = "% Individuals"
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(-25, 250),
    ylim = c(0, 1)
  ) +
  theme_test(
    base_family = "Arial",
    base_size = 8
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.key.height = unit(1, "mm"),
    legend.key.width = unit(2, "mm"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
    axis.text.y = element_text(
      angle = 90, hjust = 0.5
    )
  )
```

## Data social information importance

```{r}
files <- list.files(
  "data/results/si_imp_data",
  pattern = "default",
  full.names = TRUE
)

data_all <- lapply(files, fread)
data_all <- rbindlist(data_all)

df_si <- data_all[(dispersal == 2) & (infect_percent == F)]
df_si <- df_si[(cost == 0.25) & (regen == 50)]

# popsize
popsize <- 500

df_si[, prop := N / popsize]

# group by 1% intervals
df_si[, si_imp := plyr::round_any(si_imp, 0.01)]
df_si = df_si[, list(
  prop = sum(prop), N = sum(N)
), by = c("gen", "si_imp", "repl")]

# get time since pathogen
sgen <- 500
genmax <- 1000
df_si[, gen_abs := gen - sgen]

# save for plotting and upload
fwrite(
  df_si,
  file = "data/results/data_default_si_imp.csv"
)
```

```{r}
# load saved data
df_si <- fread("data/results/data_default_si_imp.csv")
```

```{r}
# get weighted mean and variance in social info importance
# replicate 2 is an anomaly with very high SI use, although strategies are
# similar across replicates
df_si_mean <- df_si[, list(
  mean = weighted.mean(si_imp, w = N),
  sd = Hmisc::wtd.var(si_imp, weights = N)
), by = "gen"]

df_si_mean[, c("y", "ymin", "ymax") := list(
  mean,
  mean - sd,
  mean + sd
)]
df_si_mean[, gen_abs := gen - sgen]
```

### Figure social information importance

```{r}
hmap_cols <- colorspace::sequential_hcl(
  5,
  palette = "sunset",
  rev = TRUE
)

fig_evo_si_importance =
ggplot() +
  geom_tile(
    data = df_si[repl == 4], # 7
    aes(
      gen_abs, si_imp,
      fill = N / popsize
    ),
    width = 2
  ) +
  geom_pointrange(
    data = df_si_mean[gen %% 10 == 0],
    aes(
      gen_abs, y,
      ymin = ymin,
      ymax = ymax
    ),
    size = 0.2,
    shape = 16,
    colour = "grey40"
  ) +
  geom_hline(
    yintercept = 0.5,
    col = "grey",
    lty = 2,
    size = 0.2
  ) +
  geom_vline(
    xintercept = c(0),
    lty = 2,
    size = 0.3,
    col = c("red")
  ) +
  scale_fill_gradientn(
    colours = c(
      "grey99",
      hmap_cols
    ),
    na.value = hmap_cols[5],
    limits = c(0.0, 0.3),
    breaks = c(0.01, 0.3, 0.5),
    labels = function(x) {
      a <- scales::percent(x)
      a[x == 0.3] <- ">30%"
      a
    },
    name = "% Indiv."
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    # trans = ggallin::pseudolog10_trans,
    breaks = c(-100, -25, 0, 100, 200),
    labels = scales::comma_format(
      accuracy = 1
    ),
    name = "Gens. after pathogen intro.",
    sec.axis = sec_axis(
      trans = function(x) x + sgen,
      breaks = sgen + c(-100, 0, 100, 200),
      labels = scales::comma_format(
        accuracy = 1
      ),
      name = "Generations"
    )
  )+
  scale_y_continuous(
    labels = scales::percent,
    name = "% Contribution of\nsocial information"
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(-100, 250),
    ylim = c(0, 0.5)
  ) +
  theme_test(
    base_family = "Arial",
    base_size = 8
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.key.height = unit(1, "mm"),
    legend.key.width = unit(2.5, "mm"),
    legend.title = element_text(
      vjust = 1.5
    ),
    legend.text = element_text(
      size = 6
    ),
    # axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 6),
    axis.text.y = element_text(
      angle = 90, hjust = 0.5
    )
  )
```

### Intermediate figure SI change

```{r}
fig_evo_intermediate <- wrap_plots(
  fig_evo_social_strategy,
  fig_evo_si_importance,
  guides = "collect"
) &
  plot_annotation(
    tag_levels = "A"
  ) &
  theme(
    plot.tag = element_text(
      face = "bold"
    ),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.justification = "centre",
    legend.text = element_text(
      size = 8
    ),
    legend.title = element_text(
      size = 8
    )
  )

# save intermediate figure
ggsave(
  plot = fig_evo_intermediate,
  filename = "figures/fig_evo_intermediate.png",
  width = 120,
  height = 75,
  units = "mm"
)
```

## Data ecological outcomes

Load generation data.

```{r}
# list files, read, and filter for default model options
files <- list.files(
  "data/results/gen_data",
  pattern = "default",
  full.names = TRUE
)

data_all <- lapply(files, fread)
data_all <- rbindlist(data_all)

df_eco <- data_all[(dispersal == 2) & (infect_percent == F)]
df_eco <- df_eco[(cost == 0.25) & (regen == 50)]

# popsize
popsize <- 500

# get time since pathogen
sgen <- 500
genmax <- 1000
df_eco[, gen_abs := gen - sgen]

# save for plotting and upload
fwrite(
  df_eco,
  file = "data/results/data_default_eco.csv"
)
```

```{r}
# load saved data
df_eco <- fread("data/results/data_default_eco.csv")
```

### Intake

```{r}
df_eco <- df_eco[, c(
  "gen_abs", "intake.mean", "gen",
  "moved.mean", "assoc.mean", "repl"
)]
df_eco <- melt(
  df_eco,
  id.vars = c("gen_abs", "gen", "repl")
)

## colours for background
cols <- colorspace::diverging_hcl(3, palette = "Tofino", l = 50, c = 80)
```

```{r}
# plot_intake =
ggplot(df_eco[variable %in% c("intake.mean") & gen %% 4 == 0]) +
  stat_summary(
    aes(
      gen_abs, value
    ),
    geom = "line",
    size = 0.2,
    col = cols[3],
    show.legend = F
  ) +
  stat_summary(
    aes(
      gen_abs, value
    ),
    size = 0.2,
    col = cols[3],
    show.legend = F
  ) +
  geom_vline(
    xintercept = c(0),
    lty = 2,
    size = 0.3,
    col = c("red")
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    # trans = ggallin::pseudolog10_trans,
    breaks = c(-100, -25, 0, 100, 200),
    labels = scales::comma_format(
      accuracy = 1
    ),
    name = "Gens. after pathogen intro.",
    sec.axis = sec_axis(
      trans = function(x) x + sgen,
      breaks = sgen + c(-100, 0, 100, 200),
      labels = scales::comma_format(
        accuracy = 1
      ),
      name = "Generations"
    )
  )+
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(-25, 250),
    ylim = c(6.9, 7.2)
  ) +
  theme_test(
    base_family = "Arial",
    base_size = 8
  ) +
  theme(
    # legend.position = c(0.2, 0.15),
    legend.key = element_blank(),
    legend.background = element_blank(),
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_text(
      face = "italic"
    ),
    plot.background = element_blank(),
    strip.placement = "outside"
  ) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = "Per-capita intake",
    colour = NULL,
    shape = NULL
  )
```
